title: HealthCare.gov's Next Version Is In The Hands Of Young Techies
teaser: David Greene talks to Wired magazine's Steven Levy about his story on Healthcare.gov 2.0 and the "tech surge" team that's parachuted in to build it. The next generation launches on Nov. 15.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
